p: Mitochondrial complex I activity detection assay kit (Solarbio) was used to measure the mitochondrial respiratory chain complex I activity. The absorbance was measured at 340 nm with a microplate reader. Record absorbance A1 at 10 s, reaction at 37°C for 2 min, record absorbance A2 at 2 min, calculate ΔA = A1–A2. Pierce BCA Protein Assay Kit (Thermo) was used for protein quantification. Complex I activity (U/mg prot) = [Δ A× Vtotal÷(ε× d) ×10 9] ÷ (Vsample × Cpr) ÷ T = 2,679.5 × ΔA ÷ Cpr (Vtotal = 2 × 10 −4 L; ε: NADH molar extinction coefficient, 6.22 × 10 3 L/mol/cm; d: 96-well plates diameter, 0.6 cm; Vsample = 0.01 ml; T: Reaction time, 2 min; Cpr: Sample protein concentration, mg/ml).
